title: How I solved my bluestacks graphic card error
description:
Warning: You will loose your data (images, chats, contacts etc), so do take a backup before you proceed.

receivetipstricks.com/bluestacks-graphic-card-error/
You may seen the same error where Bluestacks refuse to recognize your graphics card and ask you to update the same,even if your graphic card is already updated.
This video will guide you on how to solve graphic card error.

Backgroud music in this video
Drops of H2O ( The Filtered Water Treatment )
